entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who reappears in the story.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a wizard who asks if Snape has arrived.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Snape is a character mentioned by Moody.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is a character who was killed and whose spirit returns.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who points his wand at the newcomer.

entities.name: mrs. black
entities.description: Mrs. Black is a character whose portrait is mentioned in the story.

relationships.description: Kreacher was most likely to reappear in the hall.
Moody asks if Snape has arrived.
Harry tells the newcomer not to move.
